humanum_full_description_en:
The oracle bone inscriptions in the picture above, according to Xingwu, should be interpreted in black. Tang Lan thinks that the character is like a person (big) standing in front of him receiving ink punishment. Ink punishment refers to the punishment of tattooing and painting ink on a person's face. " Black " was later specifically used to express the extended meaning of " black " in black and white, and the original meaning of ink punishment was specifically expressed with " ink ". See " ink ". "White Tiger Pass. "Five Punishments": "The sinner, his forehead also." The early inscriptions on the oracle bone inscriptions, also from " big " from ‚óé. Later, the middle and vertical sides of the first part of the glyph and the outside of the " large " shape at the lower part were decorated with dots and strokes. Later, the " big " in the lower part of the word " black " was corrupted into " flam ". The small seals listed in "Shuowen" used this as a basis. Therefore, "Suowen" believed: "Black is the color smoked by fire. °Üß. °Üß, ancient Á™ª character. All black is from black." Since Xiao Zhuan has changed from " °Üß " from " yan ", Xu Shen mistakenly thought that the word would be smoked by the chimney and the fire would turn black.

Oracle " Black " and The shape is similar, and the different characters have the same form. The two characters can only be distinguished based on the context of the rhetoric. " Black " from Mexican criminal tattooed inking extended for black and white " black ", so Oracle used to represent black, such as "collection" 29544: "Collection" 29508 "Black Dog.": "Black sheep." "Collection" 30022: "†¶™Rain ÂèÄ black sheep" refers to praying for rain, using black sheep to worship gods. Bronze " black " characters are used for place names and personal names.

" Black " extends from black to describe dimly lit conditions, "Han Shu. "The Five Elements" quotes the Beijing room "Yi Zhuan": "It's dark in the next day. The wind is up, the sky is cloudless, and the sun is dark." The other is " black " and " white ", which are used to express right and wrong. dew. The right to reserve": "Black and white are clear, and the people know what they want."

" Black " can be pretended to be " silence ". The ancient old book "Zheng" before the second volume of Mawangdui's "Laozi": "Speaking Yang and Hei (silent) Yin", the context is relatively speaking, which means speaking is Yang, silence Belong to yin.
